reviewText: Why put the movies out before season three, four and five are available.Its been over five years since season two came out don't tell me no one bought these. This is a popular show what the heck are they waiting for. DVD's of lots shows have only a few season out why.HAPPY DAYS AND LAVERNE AND SHIRLEY BOTH STOPPED AT THE FOURTH SEASON.C'MON ITS LAVERNE AND SHIRLEY AND HAPPY DAYS, WHAT THE HECK ARE THEY WAITING.CHARLIES ANGELS NEEDS FIFTH SEASON. ONE DAY AT TIME IS CRYING OUT FOR SEASON TWO.DYNASTY IS FINALLY  COMING OUT SOON ONLY I FOUND OUT ANOTHER HALF SEASON VOLUME FOR SEASON FIVE.THAT IS SO PETTY, IN UK DYNASTY IS RELEASED IN FULL VOLUME SETS AND SEASON FIVE AND SIX HAVE BEEN OUT FOR MONTHS. I JUST GOT THEM AND PLAN TO ENJOY THEM AND BOYCOTT ANY MORE HALF VOLUME SETS OF THIS SERIES.
summary: stupidy from dvd companies is amazing
Title: Hart to Hart: Old Friends Never Say Die

reviewText: One episode per DVD is ridiculous.  Love the program but not the way it's one.....one episode per DVD.  A waste of money
summary: One episode per DVD is ridiculous and a waste of money
Title: Hart to Hart: Old Friends Never Say Die

reviewText: I find it impossible not to give this five stars because of the quality of production, acting and script. If you like the series, Hart to Hart this is a welcome addition to your collection. Because the movie is around 90 minutes long the story is able to have a few more twists which has a little more attraction to the usual 50 minute episode. I agree with the previous reviewer who expressed disappointment that these movie length shows have been released ahead of the rest of the seasons. Value for money, these movie length shows are not anywhere near as good value as  the seasons, and I think that if you haven't seen the first two seasons that are available on DVD they present much more viewing time for money.
summary: What is happening with the remaining seasons?
Title: Hart to Hart: Old Friends Never Say Die

reviewText: Great movie. I always loved the series so seeing both of the individuals again after so many years was very cool. I'm a Hart to Hart fan and will always miss the show and the series members. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who liked the show and wanted to see more of the 2 individuals. The cost was reasonable and the quality of the movie was good.
summary: Hart to Hart Old Friends Never Die
Title: Hart to Hart: Old Friends Never Say Die

reviewText: I love Hart to Hart - Robert Wagner and Stephanie Powers are a class act couple - they go together, even though they are not officially together, like salt and pepper.  They are glamorous, beautiful and love each other.  Where can you find that today in any show or movie.  Two people, who have it all and still love each other so much.  Their stories are always fun and exciting - can't go wrong buying any of their DVDs.
Title: Hart to Hart: Old Friends Never Say Die

reviewText: I love all of Hart to Hart.  The action in all of the Hart to Hart movies is great.  I would love it if Sony would release 3rd,4th, and 5th seasons.
Title: Hart to Hart: Old Friends Never Say Die
